abstract: Columbus Blue Jackets beat Boston Bruins, 6-4; other pro hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Boone Jenner scored two goals, Scott Hartnell had a goal and an assist, and Columbus beat Boston. Washington topped Arizona with a disputed goal.

headline.main: Blue Jackets Top Bruins; Capitals Win
headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets Top Bruins; Capitals Win

snippet: Boone Jenner scored two goals, Scott Hartnell had a goal and an assist, and Columbus beat Boston. Washington topped Arizona with a disputed goal.
